Root-finding for abscissa of quadrature rules

Functions

gint gqr_function_roots (gdouble *P, gdouble *Q, gdouble *R, gdouble x0, gdouble du0, gint N, gdouble *x, gdouble *du)

Function Documentation

gint gqr_function_roots ( gdouble *  P,
gdouble *  Q,
gdouble *  R,
gdouble  x0,
gdouble  du0,
gint  N,
gdouble *  x,
gdouble *  du 
)

Find the roots of the special function which solves the differential equation , using the algorithm of Glaser, A., Liu, X. and Rokhlin, V., `A fast algorithm for the calculation of the roots of special functions', SIAM Journal on Scientific Computing, 29(4):1420--1438, http://dx.doi.org/10.1137/06067016X.

Parameters:
P three element array containing the coefficients of , lowest order first;
Q three element array containing the coefficients of , lowest order first;
R three element array containing the coefficients of , lowest order first;
x0 initial root;
du0 derivative of function at x0, ;
N number of roots and derivatives to be returned;
x on return, the roots of ;
du on return, at roots of .
Returns:
0 on success.
